What Is Launch From Here?
The
Launch From Here
campaign is
a community based effort
–originally initiated by the Titusville Area Chamber Visitors Council with support from the Space Coast Office of Tourism–and it continues to grow more and more participants who understand the phrase just makes
great
brand sense
for Titusville.
Titusville on Florida’s Space Coast
is the ONLY PLACE on the planet where you can
view a rocket launch close up
, see bioluminescence from a kayak, meet majestic sea turtles nesting, and enjoy a quiet sunrise on the beach. Titusville is the next-door neighbor to Kennedy Space Center Visitor Complex, Merritt Island National Wildlife Refuge, Canaveral National Seashore, Port Canaveral and Cocoa Beach. You can
cruise from here
,
hit the theme parks
from here
, get to the Daytona Beach Speedway from here, and dip your toes in the sand and surf at
some of the most famous Atlantic Coast beaches
in the world.
Launch From Here
describes
a place known around the world
for
space exploration
and
rich in nature-based recreation
–perfect for outdoor adventures nearly every day of the year.
Launch From Here
is a proud phrase, well representing our exploration legacy and holds promise for a future rich in possibility for those who join us here.
Launch From Here
represents
all
the things we launch
–from rocket ships to cycle races, to business ventures and careers, to families and their dreams.
Thinking this might be the place to build your career or your business? Want to
LEARN MORE
about this area of the world?
Just need
ACCOMMODATIONS
so you can learn on-the-ground?
Need some
QUICK TIPS
for first-time Visitors?
Coming for a
ROCKET LAUNCH
?
Just want to ‘
GET STARTED’ EXPLORING
?
